title: Film appreciation: film as an art
creator_credit: OFM Productions, Karl Holtsnider, Simon Scanlon and Bruce Baker
brief_description: Discusses the effective use of music and of color or black and white photography in film production, showing brief extracts to illustrate the combination of art forms and techniques involved.
creator_credit_for_label: OFM Productions, Karl Holtsnider, Simon Scanlon and Bruce Baker
